page.title: 09COMMUNICATION
page.content: There is one daily postal delivery in the area every day except Sunday, with the mail brought by van from Diss; there are 4 posting boxes on posts, mail being collected twice a day Monday to Friday & once on Saturday. There are 2 public telephone kiosks. The health of the area is served by a community health centre at Botesdale & a doctor's surgery at Hopton. The general hospital is at Bury St.Edmunds Several people in the area are above retirement age, some having lived here all their lives.Some moved to the area while working and stayed, and some came on retirement. Many members of local families estbalished in the area live to considerable ages; the oldest person at present living here being 104.
